data.title: Chris Sarandon at Nightmare Weekend Des Moines Saturday & Sunday
data.meta_description: GalaxyCon is a celebration of the universe of fandom. With shows spanning eight cities across the United States and events like Nightmare Weekend, Animate!, and Fae Ball catering to specialized fandoms, it is a festival dedicated to bringing all walks of nerd culture together in a safe and fun environment.
data.text:
Meet Chris Sarandon at the Iowa Events Center September 28-29, 2024

Chris Sarandon will be appearing at Nightmare Weekend Des Moines on Saturday, September 28, and Sunday, September 29. He will participate in a live Q&A, and have a booth in the exhibition hall to meet and sign autographs with fans.

Get Tickets to Nightmare Weekend Des Moines

Iowa Events Center

730 3rd Street

Des Moines, IA 50309

Top Credits:

Jack Skellington in The Nightmare Before Christmas

Prince Humperdinck in The Princess Bride

Jerry Dandridge in Fright Night

Mike Norris in Child's Play

Judge Barry Krumble in Judging Amy

Count Dracula in Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

Appearing in Des Moines:

Friday, Saturday & Sunday
